languages.text: Звездную гавань наводнили еретики и беженцы, что усложняет поиск исправного шаттла. Однако, это по прежнему является наиболее перспективным способом покинуть планету.
The starport has been overrun by heretics and refugees, making it hard to find an intact shuttle. Still, it is the most viable way of leaving the planet.
languages.original_text: Звездную гавань наводнили еретики и беженцы, что усложняет поиск исправного шаттла. Однако, это по прежнему является наиболее перспективным способом покинуть планету.

traits.locale_text: The starport has been overrun by heretics and refugees, making it hard to find an intact shuttle. Still, it's the most viable way of leaving the planet.
The starport has been overrun by heretics and refugees, making it hard to find an intact shuttle. Still, it is the most viable way of leaving the planet.
The starport has been overrun by heretics and refugees, making it hard to find an intact shuttle. Still, it is the most viable way of leaving the planet.

languages.text: Der Raumhafen wurde von Ketzern und Flüchtlingen überrannt, was es schwer macht, ein intaktes Shuttle zu finden. Dennoch ist es der erfolgversprechendste Weg, den Planeten zu verlassen.
languages.original_text: The starport has been overrun by heretics and refugees, making it hard to find an intact shuttle. Still, it is the most viable way of leaving the planet.

traits.locale_text: Der Raumhafen wurde von Ketzern und Flüchtlingen überrannt, was es schwer macht, ein intaktes Shuttle zu finden. Dennoch ist es der erfolgversprechendste Weg, den Planeten zu verlassen.

languages.text: L'astroport est envahi d'hérétiques et de réfugiés, aussi les navettes intactes sont-elles difficiles à trouver. Pour autant, cela reste le moyen le plus viable de quitter la planète.
languages.original_text: The starport has been overrun by heretics and refugees, making it hard to find an intact shuttle. Still, it is the most viable way of leaving the planet.

traits.locale_text: L'astroport est envahi d'hérétiques et de réfugiés, aussi les navettes intactes sont-elles difficiles à trouver. Pour autant, cela reste le moyen le plus viable de quitter la planète.

languages.text: スターポートは異端者や難民で溢れかえっており、無傷のシャトルを見つけるのは難しい。それでも、この惑星を離れる最も現実的な方法だ。
languages.original_text: The starport has been overrun by heretics and refugees, making it hard to find an intact shuttle. Still, it is the most viable way of leaving the planet.

traits.locale_text: スターポートは異端者や難民で溢れかえっており、無傷のシャトルを見つけるのは難しい。それでも、この惑星を離れる最も現実的な方法だ。

languages.text: El puerto estelar está lleno de herejes y refugiados, lo que dificulta encontrar una lanzadera intacta. A pesar de eso, es la forma más viable de salir del planeta.
languages.original_text: The starport has been overrun by heretics and refugees, making it hard to find an intact shuttle. Still, it is the most viable way of leaving the planet.

traits.locale_text: El puerto estelar está lleno de herejes y refugiados, lo que dificulta encontrar una lanzadera intacta. A pesar de eso, es la forma más viable de salir del planeta.

languages.text: 星港已经被异端分子和难民占领了，很难再找到完好无损的穿梭机。但即便如此，也必须继续寻找，因为这是离开这颗行星最可行的方式。
languages.original_text: The starport has been overrun by heretics and refugees, making it hard to find an intact shuttle. Still, it is the most viable way of leaving the planet.

traits.locale_text: 星港已经被异端分子和难民占领了，很难再找到完好无损的穿梭机。但即便如此，也必须继续寻找，因为这是离开这颗行星最可行的方式。

languages.text: Yıldız limanının kâfir ve firariler tarafından istila altında olması sağlam bir mekik bulmayı zorlaştırıyor. Yine de gezegenden ayrılmanın en münasip yolu bu.
languages.original_text: The starport has been overrun by heretics and refugees, making it hard to find an intact shuttle. Still, it is the most viable way of leaving the planet.

traits.locale_text: Yıldız limanının kâfir ve firariler tarafından istila altında olması sağlam bir mekik bulmayı zorlaştırıyor. Yine de gezegenden ayrılmanın en münasip yolu bu.
